description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Help Flappy and all of his friends flap their way through all 6 unique worlds. Flappy Worlds is the sequel to Flappy Feathers. Profit for this game will be used to help fund Indiemon: Thunder Region and Indiemon Villain Version 2.
